change.item: This finding aid was updated in alignment with LC EAD 2.0 specifications using a python script created by Erik Radio.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: History of the Eastern Arizona Stake of Zion and of the Establishment of the Snowflake Stake, 1936
did.abstract: Typescript history relates events while Fish was recorder, 1879-1893. Contains brief history of each Mormon settlement including St. Johns, Ariz., Eagar, Ariz., Snowflake, Ariz., Pleasanton, N.M., and Luna, N.M. Also covers murders committed and prosecutions for polygamy.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: History of the Eastern Arizona Stake of Zion and of the Establishment of the Snowflake Stake (AZ 260). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Pioneer merchant, bookkeeper, amateur historian; Arizona. Stake recorder for Eastern Arizona Stake and Snowflake Stake, 1879-1893.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Typescript history relates events while Fish was recorder, 1879-1893. Contains brief history of each Mormon settlement including St. Johns, Ariz., Eagar, Ariz., Snowflake, Ariz., Pleasanton, N.M., and Luna, N.M. Also covers murders committed and prosecutions for polygamy.

relatedmaterial.p: Photocopy; Original in the University of Utah Library.
